page.t: [author]%s[/author][title]\033G Command accepted \033X[/title]The name of your ship %s now contains its homebase, %s.

Expands a ships name with its homebase. Works is as follows:
[Homebase] Type
Example: [Carrier 5] Argon Buster 

\033BV2.0 
\033BCopyright Jazura 562 HashtagMC Software Company, \033BHome of Light, Argon Federation
